title: Increased standard of living for workers

content.prompt: Which of the following best explains the general increase in the living standards of industrial workers between 1800 and 1914 ?

choices.label: Deficit-spending policies by governments in major industrial states
The increased supply of inexpensive consumer goods
Implementation of utopian socialist ideas in the organization of factory labor

topic.text: 5.7: Economic Developments and Innovations in the Industrial Age

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
